format.name: SPSS.data+setup
format.comment: For general info, see the DANS page for statistical data. SPSS is recommended as "data and setup" (.dat/.sps) format as the most sustainable option.

format.name: SPSS.por
format.comment: For general info, see the DANS page for statistical data. The Portable version of the SPSS format is not recommended.

format.name: SPSS.sav
format.comment: For general info, see the DANS page for statistical data. The standard save version of the SPSS format is not recommended.

format.name: STATA.data+setup
format.comment: For general info, see the DANS page for statistical data. STATA is recommended as "data and setup" (.dat/.DO) format as the most sustainable option.

format.name: STATA.dta
format.comment: For general info, see the DANS page for statistical data. The native format of STATA is not recommended.
